noOfTestcases = int(raw_input())
for i in range(0, noOfTestcases):
	arr = map(int, raw_input().split())
	noz = arr[0]
	minimum = arr[1]
	ind = 1
	for x in range(2, 10):
		if arr[x] < minimum:
			minimum = arr[x]
			ind = x
	if minimum <= noz:
		print str(ind)*(minimum+1)
	else:
		print '1'+'0'*(noz+1)
